content: number if not just fudge it dogs don t care slip_stitch to join chain 2 fpdc bpdc repeat to the end of the row slip_stitch to join chain 2 fpdc in the first fpdc bpdc in the next bpdc repeat around slip_stitch to join repeat last row chain 1 single_crochet around slip_stitch to join chain 1 cr around or single_crochet if you don t do crab stitch slip_stitch to join tie off and cut yarn weave in ends ear tufts cut 6 pieces of yarn about 5 or so inches long fold in half insert a smaller hook in the first row and out through the center of the mc pull loop thru put ends of yarn thru the loop and pull tight lark s head knot repeat on the other ear cone put it on your pup  please feel free to make and sell hats from this pattern do not sell the pattern just provide a link back to it thank you
